text: Poor Fool may refer to: *"Poor Fool," a 1961 song by R&B; duo Ike & Tina Turner *"Poor Fool," a song 2017 by 2 Chainz featuring Swae Lee from Pretty Girls Like Trap Music *Poor Fool, a character in The Good Earth, anovel by Pearl S. Buck *Poor Fool, a 1930 novel by Erskine Caldwell *Poor Fool, He Makes Me Laugh, an aria from the opera-in-opera Il Muto ==See also== *Poor Little Fool *Poor Misguided Fool
title: Poor Fool
